name: Ice Worm
description: The Ice Worm is a gargantuan beast with a muscular, elongated body, capable of burrowing through rock and earth.
memorable: Its ability to swallow opponents and inflict debilitating poison makes it a fearsome foe in combat.
goals: Predation and ambushing warm-blooded creatures, utilizing its tunneling abilities.
relations: Similar to other enormous predators, it might share territory with creatures that dwell underground.
environment: Typically found in icy or rocky terrains where it can tunnel and ambush prey.
strengths: Exceptionally powerful melee attacks and high durability with a significant HP pool.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Intelligence, which may limit its maneuverability and strategic capabilities.
attacks: Multiattack with a bite that can swallow, and a tail stinger that inflicts strong poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Swallowing large or smaller creatures makes the Ice Worm a deadly predator in close combat.
senses: Blindsight allows it to sense creatures without relying on sight, and tremorsense helps it detect movements through the ground.
additional_information: Capable of creating large tunnels through solid rock.
Can sense warm-blooded creatures from a distance.
Resistant to adverse effects from various spells due to high Constitution.
Has an effective fighting style, even when retreating.
Dual attack options enhance its combat effectiveness.
test_queries: monster that swallows prey and inflicts poison
powerful ice worm attacking warm creatures
